definition: Ba state during Zhou dynasty (in east of modern Sichuan)/abbr. for east Sichuan or Chongqing/surname Ba/abbr. for Palestine or Palestinian/abbr. for Pakistan

to long for/to wish/to cling to/to stick to/sth that sticks/close to/next to/spread open/informal abbr. for bus 巴士[ba1 shi4]/bar (unit of pressure)/nominalizing suffix on certain nouns, such as 尾巴[wei3 ba5], tail

sentences.english: All glories to the devotees of the Baku Yatra.
sentences.chinese: 所有的荣耀归于巴库的奉献者。

sentences.english: He was an organizer in Batum and Baku factories.
sentences.chinese: 他是巴统和巴库工厂的组织者。

sentences.english: This has left Baku gearing up for the limelight.
sentences.chinese: 这一切让巴库走到了聚光灯下。

sentences.english: Moreover, corruption can add a premium to many transactions in Baku.
sentences.chinese: 此外在巴库，腐败是许多交易的润滑剂。

sentences.english: Baku is a city with a special atmosphere.
sentences.chinese: 巴库是个有着特殊氛围的城市。

sentences.english: The towers can be seen from any part of Baku.
sentences.chinese: 从巴库的任何一个地方都可以看到火焰大厦。

sentences.english: For several years Baku has been experiencing an incredible building boom.
sentences.chinese: 几年以来，巴库一直体验着不可思议的建筑狂潮。

sentences.english: She stayed on Bakura, reviving the world from the damaging invasion.
sentences.chinese: 盖丽尔留在巴库拉，从破坏性的入侵中复兴这个世界。

sentences.english: Baku is in the desert and the government rations the water.
sentences.chinese: 巴库处于沙漠地带，政府对供水采取供给制。

sentences.english: An infant Bacchus or Jupiter is big with his future destiny.
sentences.chinese: 作为婴儿的巴库斯或朱庇特正孕育着其未来的命运。

definition: the Ural mountains in Russia, dividing Europe from Asia
Abu Dhabi, capital of United Arab Emirates (UAE)
Yekaterinburg (Russian city, also known as Ekaterinburg or Sverdlovsk)
Vladivostok (Russian port city)/Chinese name 海參崴|海参崴
pinyin: Fu2 la1 di2 wo4 si1 tuo1 ke4

definition: T'bilisi, capital of Georgia 格魯吉亞|格鲁吉亚[Ge2 lu3 ji2 ya4]
Essen, city in the Ruhr 魯爾區|鲁尔区[Lu3 er3 Qu1], Germany
